name: Hamster Run
description:
Take advantage of our introductory price, only $2.99!

Think you've got what it takes?

Hamster Run is not your average runner. This thrilling adventure puts you at the controls of our hamster hero as you jump, slide and blast your way through exciting, fast paced courses.

Watch the vibrant, ever changing landscape zoom by as you race through four exciting cartoon worlds.

Our hero will amaze you with his acrobatic jumps and impressive slides.

Throw your magic pepper at passing barrels and crates to gain points or blast your way through obstacles but be careful, throwing the magic pepper uses energy. The lower your energy, the slower you run. If your energy runs out your game is done! Collect hearts as you run to fill your energy and speed up your run to true superspeed potential. 

Are you the best in the world or can someone beat your score? Submit your score to see where you stand or keep it to yourself. We don't collect any sensitive information, just fill out the simple form and submit!

Hope you enjoy Hamster Run!

Take a look at some of our other projects at http://blitzargames.com
